channel.title: Update server thing
channel.description:
well i think i may have found a way to bypass the update server thing but i need some 1ns opinion anyways in client.java on line 315 i changed [code](Socket) (Class16.aClass6_311.anObject149)[/code]
to
[code]new Socket("ny4.runescape.com", 43594)[/code]
then i changed
[code]Class60.aString1289 = "127.0.0.1";[/code]
to another server that isnt runescape (a private server)
the server u change the "127.0.0.1" must be online for it to connect to the update server >.> (just found that out)
and the update server loaded and then wen i tryd to log in the client sayd "undexpected response from server" so does it mean it connected to update server but then couldent connect to the normal server? (im new to the client hacking >.>)

well i think i may have found a way to bypass the update server thing but i need some 1ns opinion anyways in client.java on line 315 i changed

(Socket) (Class16.aClass6_311.anObject149)

to

new Socket("ny4.runescape.com", 43594)

to another server that isnt runescape (a private server)

the server u change the “127.0.0.1” must be online for it to connect to the update server >.> (just found that out)

and the update server loaded and then wen i tryd to log in the client sayd “undexpected response from server” so does it mean it connected to update server but then couldent connect to the normal server? (im new to the client hacking >.>)
